title: Align Basel landing page layout with Zürich page and add entry image

requirements.text: Update the Basel couples landing page layout structure to match the Zürich couples landing page layout, including section arrangement, spacing, and content hierarchy

quotes: Die BAsel Seite muss sich vom Layout mehr an der Zürich Seite orientieren

Content sections appear in the same order on both pages

requirements.text: Add an entry/hero image to the Basel couples landing page matching the visual presentation of the Zürich couples landing page hero section
acceptanceCriteria: Basel page displays a hero image in the same position and style as the Zürich page

constraints: Maintain existing SEO metadata and Open Graph tags on Basel page
